ygData.subject: Re: Is there anyone out there still on this list?  No bugs here.
ygData.msgSnippet: Its quiet here.... I have a high level Magician and just recently started a Paladin.  I have to say... I really like him.. but hate not being able to gate.
ygData.messageBody:
Its quiet here....


I have a high level Magician and just recently started a Paladin. I have to
say... I really like him.. but hate not being able to gate. Do you all
just walk the land? Selling and buying from Innkeepers? Just going back to
train? Or is it not that big or a concern? I cant remember the last time I
actually walked back to a city unless it was just to bind myself there...



Anyway... I also really hate it when I use LOH on the MOB I'm trying to
kill.... It never seems to appreciate it.
